articles.title: Senate unanimously passes a bill making Juneteenth a federal holiday - CNN
articles.description: The Senate unanimously passed a resolution on Tuesday establishing June 19 as Juneteenth National Independence Day, a US holiday commemorating the end of slavery in the United States.
